name: ColdCurve Denham
description:
This is very early in development as was started during an assignment for University of Northampton

To play this game you need a controller

Leave a trail of blood as you clear through levels floor by floor with nothing but you shear will to cause ultimate bloodshed.

Hotline Miami inspired game but with a 3D perspective, fast paced action with a lot of blood and a lot of deaths.

For future development I plan to better the art style as well as add story elements more weapons and maybe even bosses.
